Name: Kabounce
About the game: Kabounce™ - multiplayer pinball sport, you are the ball! Take complete control of the ball and reach ridiculous speeds with intuitive momentum and rhythm based movement in this re-imagining of pinball. Rack up sweet combos and points by hitting bumper pins and perform spinning skill moves in short, 5 minute, matches. Eliminate opposing players to steal their hard-earned points and score to win! Up to 8 players online, 4 vs 4. SINGLEPLAYER Take the action offline with over 50 time-attack parkour challenges (and be sure to snag up the hidden skins and rewards). Keep up the pace, cut corners, use walls and bumpers - earn a bronze, silver, gold or developer star! Top the leaderboards for the coveted blue star. ROLL IN STYLE Millions of ridiculous, over the top cosmetic combinations - we proudly offer you the most elaborate pinball garage in the world! Select a pinball, paint it, match some stylish eyewear and accessories - top it off with hats, horns or hair*. *Afro included. SCORE You too can ride this rollercoaster track, it's not just for show, here you bank your dough - oOOoh hey, we did a rhyme. FEATURES: [insert really long list of features here to make your game look more impressive] Online Multiplayer: Up to 8-player online, 4 versus 4. Split Screen: Play up to 4-player split screen locally - or join an online match. Time Attack: Test your skill and race against ghosts or friends in parkour-like platforming challenges - or improve your global rank on the leaderboards. Roll in style: Millions of possible combinations to personalize your pinball! Cross-platform: Cross play support between PlayStation®4 and Steam players. Ranked: The same thing as Casual Quick Play really, sure - you get an icon plus rating for boasting, but why? Bots: Each with their own personality and playing style, watch out for M.A.X. he is very [explicit]. If S.A.M. is on your team, we're sorry for your loss. Matchmaking: You may not love the person we set you up with, but we'll match you anyway. Abilities: select between powerful abilities to capture bumpers and eliminate players. Original Sound Track: A dozen Original Electronic Sound Tracks and multiple in-match dynamic sound tracks that change based on how you play (if it doesn't, that means you're doing it wrong :)).
